thread.title: U.S. Supreme Court sides with disabled girl and her 'Wonder' dog
thread.title_full: U.S. Supreme Court sides with disabled girl and her 'Wonder' dog

author: Nathan Clark | nclark1@mlive.com
title: U.S. Supreme Court sides with disabled girl and her 'Wonder' dog
text: U.S. Supreme Court sides with disabled girl and her 'Wonder' dog Supreme Court Service Dog Ehlena Fry of Michigan, sits with her service dog Wonder, while speaking to reporters outside the Supreme Court in Washington. The Supreme Court says a lower court should take another look at whether Fry, who has cerebral palsy can sue Michigan school officials over their refusal to let her to bring a service dog to class. (AP Photo/Molly Riley, File) (Molly Riley)
